page.title: 13INDUSTRY IN CLUNBURY
page.content: The area has very little industry as it is quiet, rural, farming country. The only industry we found was{Speed {Engineering}near{Aston-on-Clun}and close to the railway halt on the eastern edge of our block. We were shown round Speed Engineering with our head teacher Mrs. Hibbs. They make{agricultural {machinery,}mostly{trailer attachments for tractors like{turnip choppers, also they make{barbecues,}a new gas type which has a solid metal surface and does not smoke. Four men and a secretary work there.
